title: The Defilement of Dinah
summary: Genesis 34 recounts the story of Dinah, who is defiled by Shechem, the local prince. His request to marry her is met with deceit by her brothers, who then kill the men of the city and plunder it.

faq.question: What did Shechem do to Dinah?
faq.answer: He violated her but also wanted to marry her afterward.

faq.question: Why did Jacobâ€™s sons attack the city?
faq.answer: They were enraged by the offense against Dinah and sought revenge under the pretense of requiring circumcision.
